cards.rules_text: Whenever Geistwald Retainer deals combat damage to a player, you may search your library for a creature card with mana value equal to the amount of damage dealt, exile it, then shuffle. Geistwald Retainer becomes a copy of that creature, then gains this ability.

When Waldemar enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card until Waldemar leaves the battlefield. As long as it remains exiled, you may cast it and spend mana as though it were any type to cast it. When you do, exile Waldemar, then return him to the battlefield transformed under an opponent’s control.
